item.title: Resilience Expert: How to Be Mentally Strong When Life Falls Apart - Dr. Cristi Bundukamara
item.description:
How do you find the strength to go on after unimaginable loss?


In this deeply moving and powerful episode, we are joined by Dr. Cristi Bundukamara, a psychiatric nurse practitioner, author, and mother who has navigated the profound grief of losing three of her children and her husband.


Dr. Cristi Bundukamara shares her incredible story of resilience, not as a tale of enduring pain, but as a journey of actively building mental strength... Feed: https://feeds.acast.com/public/shows/67282bf5ce5bc563cb7669da

item.title: #1682: Preview of IDFA DocLab’s 2025 Selection of “Perception Art” & Immersive Stories
item.description: IDFA DocLab is the immersive selection of non-fiction digital and immersive stories that is a part of the International Documentary Film Festival Amsterdam (IDFA), and they're having their 19th selection this year. Feed: http://voicesofvr.com/?feed=podcast
